name: King of The Ricochet
description:
In King of The Ricochet in order to kill enemies or speed through gaps you must be ricocheting!

To ricochet, YOU GET HURT!

Find ways to damage yourself and bounce around in this short, but cute puzzle game.

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Reset the Level: R

Font: https://caffinate.itch.io/fibberish

Background Art: https://ansimuz.itch.io/patreons-top-down-collection

Tiles: https://gtibo.itch.io/mechanical-tileset

Spikes: https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack

Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev

Sound Effects: https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack
